messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Gravity Generator Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a horde of energy draining parasites have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Pod Four.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Locker Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on [REDACTED], we believe that one of the station's lesser lifeforms has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
